string.value: #b#@1010100:##k in #b#m100000000##k says she hates getting wet in the rain.

Although usually sunny, #b#m100000000##k has rainy days from time to time. Because #b#@1010100:##k hates getting wet in the rain, she has asked you to bring her some materials with which she can make an umbrella.

Bring 20 #rGreen Mushroom Caps#k after hunting #rGreen Mushrooms#k.
(You can easily find them in the #b#m105050400##k.)

Report back to #b#@1010100:##k in #b#m100000000##k upon completion.
You have collected 20 #rGreen Mushroom Caps#k for #b#p1010100##k since she said she wanted to make an umbrella.

Hello, adventurer. Isn't the weather in #b#m100000000##k beautiful?

But it may rain even in this wonderful weather.

But you can't buy umbrellas anywhere in #b#m100000000##k.

So I'm trying to make my own unbrella, but I need some items. Would you help me find them?

Please hunt #rGreen Mushrooms#k and bring me 20 #rGreen Mushroom Caps#k?
You can easily find #rGreen Mushrooms#k in #b#m104040001##k.
You didn't have to rush so much, but I really appreciate it.
Ah, finally finished! My very own Green Mushroom Umbrella.\n\nDespite the fact that this umbrella is heavy and stinky, I really like it! I wish it would rain soon! Tee hee!
